questions.question: $$x_1^2 + x_1x_2 = 10 \tag{eq. 1}$$ $$ x_2 + 3x_1x_2^2 = 57 \tag{eq. 2}$$ $$\text{Solve the non-linear set of equations} $$ $$ \text{Take initial guess: } x_1=1.5, \quad x_2 = 3.5 $$ $$\text{Find 2nd iteration of } x_1 \text{ using Newton Raphson method}$$

$$x_1^2 + x_1x_2 = 10 \tag{eq. 1}$$ $$ x_2 + 3x_1x_2^2 = 57 \tag{eq. 2}$$ $$\text{Solve the non-linear set of equations} $$ $$ \text{Take initial guess: } x_1=1.5, \quad x_2 = 3.5 $$ $$\text{Find 2nd iteration of } x_2 \text{ using Newton Raphson method}$$
